title: Sound issues 8.5
body:
So volume settings got completely butchered this patch.

I had my master volume set pretty low before and everything was set up pretty well, now because of whatever change happened basically all other volume levels wouldn't even play unless they were above level 25.

Also when I readjusted my master volume to fix the issue I realized all the other volume settings were COMPLETELY off balance. Sound effects especially.
-backing for one is too loud
-champion sound effects are too quiet
-the shop is too quiet

It's just a huge mess and I'm just not even gonna play til it's fixed. I'm an audiophile and this actually triggers me. Literally.... literally triggered.

Hope we can get this figured out. k bye.

replies.body:
Hey folks - a big part of the 8.5 patch was an under the hood upgrade to the audio engine. We'll be monitoring your feedback and bug reports very closely over the next few patches while we iron out some kinks in the system.

We absolutely hear your concerns, and rest assured we are working hard to remedy these issues.

Thank you for taking the time to respond to my thread and I'm happy it could be recognized by you guys as a legitimate issue. I'm looking forward to the tuning you guys implement in the future and an even better audio engine than we had before. Thanks again.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Everytime I win a match, the victory sound IS SO FREAKING LOUD IT KILLS ME.

Yeah, it´s so damn annoying.. I literally don´t play anymore because it triggers so much when some of the Sound Effects are so low and then there is something like the victory screen and your ears are actually exploding. Is there any fix out yet?
I've had the same issue. The victory audio is literally explosive i've tried fiddling with the audio controls but it doesn't affect the Victory screen Please help. I'm already deaf

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Eno,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GqGHyEqH,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2018-03-08T02:12:26.081+0000)
>
> Hey folks - a big part of the 8.5 patch was an under the hood upgrade to the audio engine. We'll be monitoring your feedback and bug reports very closely over the next few patches while we iron out some kinks in the system.
> 
> We absolutely hear your concerns, and rest assured we are working hard to remedy these issues.

Kinks?  You are aware that the game is completely broken for many people now right?  No I'm not being sarcastic, or exaggerating.  Whatever "under the hood upgrade" you guys did has a) stopped audio playing altogether, causing b) the game struggling to even run, resulting in 1/2 second to 2 second freezes in relatively similar 1/2 second to 2 second intervals.  That's pretty significant, and I would hope that these patches come in relatively short order.

> [{quoted}](name=nomeensno,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GqGHyEqH,comment-id=000c0001,timestamp=2018-03-09T15:50:32.317+0000)
>
> Kinks?  You are aware that the game is completely broken for many people now right?  No I'm not being sarcastic, or exaggerating.  Whatever "under the hood upgrade" you guys did has a) stopped audio playing altogether, causing b) the game struggling to even run, resulting in 1/2 second to 2 second freezes in relatively similar 1/2 second to 2 second intervals.  That's pretty significant, and I would hope that these patches come in relatively short order.

I'm having this same experience... the game lags up when things get intense... has caused me to lose many teamfights due to not being able to see what's going on - about to get demoted because of this crap :\

And this is a point where you should allow us to have something that was working fine before your "experts" touched it. 
-Recall is loud af no matter how low i set the volume
-Leveling up rapes my ears
-I can't hear champion noises because i had to lower the volume to 1 because other sounds deafens me
I did several repairs. It was working fine before y'all touched it. 
Also i have no 3d sound at all. If my camera is not on the center of a fight, i won't hear there is anything going on. 
You tried to do something fancy again, but ended up fucking it up. It's distracting. I'm in the menu every minute or recall because i just try to do some shit to the setting. And you expect me to stay calm and play the rankeds like that.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Eno,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GqGHyEqH,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2018-03-08T02:12:26.081+0000)
>
> Hey folks - a big part of the 8.5 patch was an under the hood upgrade to the audio engine. We'll be monitoring your feedback and bug reports very closely over the next few patches while we iron out some kinks in the system.
> 
> We absolutely hear your concerns, and rest assured we are working hard to remedy these issues.

Is there a chance you could add a volume slider for HUD_Global_audio.bnk?

Sounds to exclude from this slider (the slider would not affect them): 

1) Pings (they already have their own slider)

2) The turret aggro noise (because muting this makes no sense - it's more of a "battle" noise, and not an HUD noise, and actually conveys very important information). Soundcloud link:
https://soundcloud.com/user-956579527/509359922a

If everything else could be affected by the volume slider (allowing me to mute them) that would be great.

It would really be neat if I could mute the HUD without using mods. I've been playing with it muted... For probably years now (around the same time you introduced the ping volume slider). I like spamming buttons, and some of the sounds hurt my ears (and give me a headache), which is why I originally muted it. And now with you guys moving to the WAD format, this is harder to do (I need to remake my mod every patch), and I'm also risking being banned if you guys ever change your stance on cosmetic mods and just start banning anyone with modified WAD files.

Thanks for all your hard work, and thanks for reading our posts.

Although I didn’t have issue with the sound volume settings being switched by sound is essentially inoperable. Static throughout every sub category within the game. I uninstalled and reinstalled. All my sound devices are up to date. Started after patch 8.5. Literally have been playing with all the sound muted except for sound effects, where the static is just bearable.

Hey, i only have this problem if im using Bluetooth headphones like JBL earplugs, but not with wired earplugs or build-in speakers on my laptop,
is this part of the issue or is there a problem with my computer, im gaming on a Macbook air so yea :S
Looks like I'm not the only one. I'll get ear raped when nexus explodes..

I thinked im only one who meet problems with sound
I always playing with too low sound , like ~20%
But after batch 8.5 this sounds became too loud :
- Recall
- Explosion Nexus
- Beginning of the game , when summoners appear
etc.
I hope this will fixed as soon as possible {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
yeah i get earraped everytime i level up and it annoys me so much. :(
I have the same issue, the money sound when u kill a minion, the flashes and the recall are all too loud

+1 
the sound on certain events(backport, mastery7emote, defeat/victory-screen) is much to loud. 
makes it hard to enjoy the game as much as before.
my first comment ever btw. :)

Going to be honest here, sound playing too quiet or too loud is one of the most (if not the only) infuriating bugs for me. I can not focus on playing the game if something plays too loud and I can't hear other sound effects (and that's also one of the reasons it's difficult for me to play Evelynn, because the sound is so different when her passive is active). Less of an issue when a sound effect is missing, I'll probably still catch the visual effect with my eye. But a sound that deafens me just distracts me.

Now I know Riot has updated their sound engine. Whatever it changes, I have no idea, but for one I know such sound issues happen once in a while.
Even in 8.4 I read some people complaining about announcers voice being off. Luckily it didn't happen to me, or I didn't catch that.

Because difference in sounds is such a sensitive subject for me, I don't want to play the game until it's fixed, be it a hotfix or next patch.
Commenting to raise awareness and to add to the list, summoner spells such as flash and teleport are incredibly loud as well.
my sound doesn't work in champion select nor que pop up , im not sure if its just on the headphones or overall, but it always happens since patch 8.5

Aye boys I contacted rito they got back to me with these steps worked for me let me know how it goes!



{{item:2012}} I am LudusBonus from Riot Technical Player Support, and I'll be jumping on this issue for you!

Hm, that is pretty odd! I have a few ideas at what may fix this, we got this!

1) I see you have alot of processes running on your computer. Some of which could be interfering with League of Legends. To eliminate the possibility of that happening, let's turn off your unnecessary start up processes. This has the added benefit of making your PC boot up faster :)

Go to your start menu and type in the search area, "Command Prompt"
Open Command Prompt and type msconfig and then hit enter
A window shall open, select Selective Startup and uncheck Load Startup items.
Click Apply, OK and then restart your PC.
Also, make sure TunnelBear VPN is off for now just to make sure its not interfering with League.

2) I notice you have a few Overlay programs running. Any overlay program can cause crashing in League as it conflicts with League trying to have priority over processes running. Below are the overlays you'll want to keep off for now:

Windows 10 DVR - Follow this link to disable xbox DVR: https://www.howtogeek.com/273180/how-to-disable-windows-10s-game-dvr-and-game-bar/
Discord has an overlay in User Settings > Overlay - Keep that off as well
Plays.tv - Uninstall this program to prevent it from turning back on while in League
Rainmeter- Keep off while League is running
3) Let's try a complete config reset which will clear your settings incase of any corruption:

*First open the launcher, log in, and then minimize
*Next go to your league folder located at C:\Riot Games\League of Legends and delete the folder called 'config' completely
*Finally try to launch a custom game

If your issue persists, please send me updated HRT logs so I can continue to investigate the issue.

LudusBonus
Jax Main
Riot Games Player Support{{item:2012}}

replies.poster: T o m a s u m i
replies.body: That didn't help me, I still can't hear chat clicks and ping sounds, I also can't hear the sound when I buy items, Everything else is fine.

The guide above is pretty interesting, I'm sure, but IT DOESN'T ADRESS THE ISSUE AT ALL!

The freaking victory/defeat sound is so loud, its ridiculous. Just give us an option to decrease its volume or to disable it completly. (I would like that.)
I am recently having audio issues and it is effecting my whole computer while the launcher is open. It freezes my games and stutters it while I hear my audio fizz out and completely go blank
How do I turn off the annoying announcer's voice in the current patch?
thank you for fixing this bug

Is it fixed for? :o  
not for me.. nexus explosion, recall, emotes, summoner spells are still extremly loud..

> [{quoted}](name=Yoné,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GqGHyEqH,comment-id=001e0000,timestamp=2018-03-21T11:34:36.861+0000)
>
> Is it fixed for? :o  
> not for me.. nexus explosion, recall, emotes, summoner spells are still extremly loud..

fixed in 8.6, apparently
will this ever be fixed

Hey guys, I actually solved that problem for me. I had the same exact issues with too loud/mute sounds after the patch.
So try these steps:

Open your volume mixer in the taskbar and click on your playback device. 
Now there can be tabs like "Advanced" "Enhanced" and so on. Open these tabs and uncheck options like "Allow applications to controll these settings" uncheck all other options that are not needed.

Remember depending on your device tabs and options may have other names, but should be relativly the same.

After I did the above Leauge just going well as it was befor.
Good luck.

All of you need to learn what triggered actually means.  None of you are having PTSD panic attacks because a noise is too high.  You're mad about it, you get earraped, all of the above. Quit with the triggered nonsense.
It was a joke and I'm sorry if it offended you.
Having the same exact issue! Hope they notice it soon :/

> [{quoted}](name=iWillTraceUrIP,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GqGHyEqH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-07T14:44:55.528+0000)

SAme issue. Concerned that prolonged use of this patch will damage my hearing and headphones. 

Please fix asap./

Dude this patch is terrible. I was playing with 30% master volume and that nexus explosion sound is too high. I was playing on the speaker at midnight and everything was barely hearable then we either won or lost then the explosion sound was too damn high.

Since the new path I can't play with the audio going as usual. It's like having audio lags, with sound effects and music shutting down every 2-3 seconds. This is for sure related to the new sound engine, as I have not experienced this issue before or have sound issues on everything else on my pc.
Same here...

My game sounds are so glitchi, that I get earraped with every single ability, backing, leveling up, dying, coming back to life, everything... Please fix / revert the sound because this makes the game unplayable for me and I belive many others aswell.
AHHH The nexus was a weapon all along rip eardrums

I probably found a fix for this issue. Depending on what sound device you use. I've disabled the "Dolby Digital Plus" feature in my sound device settings. Maybe this can help someone of you guys. Maybe the LoL sound engine got some major issues with 'sound enhancing' settings on the driver itself.
I have the same problem

in Aram the Snowball throw sound, ignite, (so maybe all summoner spells) the beginning spawn sound, the end game nexus explosion and notably {{champion:28}}  e ability is Incredibly loud while everything else is fine, just something to let you know
{{sticker:sona-playing}}
Can I just the say that the sound of the nexus exploding in ARAM sounds like a goddamn thunderstorm just cracked in my ears now? Jesus it scared me the first few games.
the victory sound is wayyyy too loud, hurts my ears
Try getting a baron recall

It's pretty bad, I tried my hardest to make everything work together but once below a certain threshold audio won't play at all and if raised above it, it'll be too loud
Not hearing the shop "ping" or healing being the loudest thing ever is super annoying
**I have a feeling this is affecting people with low master volumes** Please help
Same here recall, Eve, victory/defeat screen, lvl 7 mastery and many other things are just insanely loud. reinstall didnt help.

recall = too load 
defeat sound = too too load
and some other stuff are bugged
